expo.name: Sparks

plugins.microphonePermission: This app uses speech synthesis for language learning in flashcards.

plugins.photosPermission: FoodCam accesses your photo library to save and select food photos for your diary.
plugins.cameraPermission: FoodCam uses the camera to take photos of your food for your visual food diary.

expo.description: A collection of interactive micro-experiences - spin the wheel, spanish flashcards, business simulations, visual food diary, and more all in one app.

infoPlist.NSUserNotificationsUsageDescription: Sparks uses notifications to send you daily reminders and updates about your activities.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: FoodCam uses the camera to take photos of your food for your visual food diary and TripStory allows users to capture photos of their trips.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: FoodCam accesses your photo library to save and select food photos for your diary. TripStory allows photos to add photos of their trip to their TripStory.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Use the microphone to record sounds for the Sound Board spark.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: Spanish Flashcards and Amigo sparks uses speech synthesis for language Spanish.
